title: 4.4 Master Challenge 2
question: Create a web page with a div element and set the image of an astronaut. Add the CSS animation to move the astronaut up and down, as if floating in the air. Create another div for shadow. When the astronaut comes down, increase the size of the shadow. When the astronaut goes up, decrease the size of the shadow.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
